title: Essentials of Health Informatics

title: Clinical Informatics Timeline
text:
1943
      
      Colossus computer
      
        The first electronic computer. Used as a codebreaker in World War II.
      
    
  

  
    
      1952
      First use of HIT
      
        Dr Arthur Rappoport uses the McBee Manual Punch Card in pathology labs.
      
    
  

  
    
      1974
      First personal computer
      
        The first computer for personal use.
